strIntroduction: 韩国著名作家李秉律曾写，“想偷偷嗅到人们生活的香气，市场最好。”透过市场的蓬勃的生命力来了解中国传统民风是绝佳的好机会。菠罗古老肉，弥漫着香气，吃起来又酸又甜，里脊肉不油腻，搭配上清爽的水果，是春夏季开胃又解馋的美味佳肴，再带您到当地居民家里学包饺子，简单易上手，让你轻松无负担
strTitle: 【变身特级厨师】中式名菜烹饪体验课程

strIntroduction: 《天府蜀韻》有著高科技打造的舞台，通過把聲、光、電、藝術、特技、武術、舞蹈等融會貫通，呈現給觀眾的是繁華歷史、享譽天下的川蜀風情，您可以盡情享受這裡任何的光與影，此時此刻川蜀文化的動感呈現在您面前！
strTitle: 【如夢似幻的演出】成都歡樂谷大劇院－《天府蜀韻》門票

strIntroduction: 紐約時報：全球最值得一去的景點之一 ”莫干山“ CNN將這裏稱為：除了長城之外，你必須要去的中國特色地方之一！莫干山以竹、泉、雲和清、綠、冰、靜的環境著稱，是舒壓放鬆，避暑清涼的好地方，素有“清涼世界”之美譽，“晨起如春，夜眠如秋”。
strTitle: 【全球最值得去的景點之一】杭州莫干山一日遊，今夏避暑勝地

strIntroduction: Facebook创办人在西安哪段城墙上慢跑的？三藏西天取经回来把经书放在哪里？有深度的自由行绝不走马看花，专业优质导游带你骑自行车或走路钻进7000多年文明史的大街小巷，一日游览中国十三朝古都西安！
strTitle: 【唐三藏西天取经的起点！】西安城墙、大雁塔、陕西历史博物馆、回民街、化觉巷清真寺、钟楼经典徒步一日游

strIntroduction: 拉薩在保有自己神秘魅力的同時，迅速吸收著世界各地五彩斑斕的文化，無論對於什麼地方來的人，這濃濃的異域風情都會馬上擊中你，如入夢境，走進神秘的桑耶寺，印度、藏式及漢式建築的融合使人留下難忘的印象，對於這片高原淨土，以及那片藍得令人久久無法忘懷的天空，任誰都無法抗拒
strTitle: 【西藏朝聖之旅】西藏拉薩、日喀則、珠峰、納木措、山南 12日拼團深度遊（含住＋專業導遊）

strIntroduction: 東方明珠塔由十一個大小不一、錯落有致的球體架構組建而成，從蔚藍的天空串聯到如茵的草地，描繪出一幅“大珠小珠落玉盤”的如夢畫卷。360度環繞的透明觀光電梯，更是世界上獨一無二的！
strTitle: 【東方明珠塔門票】上海必遊地標，俯瞰黃浦江璀璨美景

strIntroduction: 明孝陵，南京最大的帝王陵墓，亦是中国古代最大的帝王陵寝之一。踏上有五百多年历史的石像路，探访朱元璋和皇后马氏的合葬陵墓
strTitle: 【明清皇家第一陵】南京必遊景点 明孝陵成人票

strIntroduction: 青城山是祕境般的存在，在山水交錯之間飽覽重重道觀、亭閣、古木、岩洞的景色，淅淅瀝瀝的小雨灑在石階青苔上，山林間盤繞的山巒點綴了青城山的氣勢，清新無比的空氣讓您可以暫時忘卻一切世間的煩惱
strTitle: 【秘境般的存在】青城山風景區門票

strIntroduction: 一个富有江南水乡气息的地方，喜欢古典文化、安静的朋友绝对不能错过这里，古色古香的秦淮河可以在下午十分逛半晚到秦淮河看看李香君故居、听听堂前燕子的故事，入夜后才是秦淮河最美的时刻，坐上画舫听听秦淮八艳的动人故事看着两岸美景及表演任思绪翩飞沉浸在当地的气息当中
strTitle: 【南京古老文明的摇篮】南京总统府＋外秦淮河一日游 成人联票

strIntroduction: 「電影非誠勿擾的朝聖景點」「Trip Advisior網友評選最有吸引力的長城」，慕田峪危嶺雄關，景色雄偉秀麗，人為破壞少。 徒步冒險的好地方，風景區兩邊接連的野長城更是有歷史的味道。
strTitle: 【萬里長城的精華】慕田峪長城觀光拼團一日遊

strIntroduction: Discovery Adventures welcomes adventure lovers, vacation/holiday planners and family groups for a day of adventures in the park. Our range of activities includes Zip Line, Hot Air Balloon, Climbing Wall, Obstacle Course, Challenge Course, and Adventure Trekking.
strTitle: 【Discovery Adventures Moganshan Park】SURVIVAL TREKKING＋CHALLENGE Course－ Half Day Tour Package Lesson

strIntroduction: 南京，既有自然山水之勝，又有歷史文物之雅，其城市綠化為全國之冠，是兼具古今文明的園林化城市，亦可說是古今文化薈萃之地，自然景觀、人文古跡點綴其中，古老悠久的文化遺產，現代文明的經濟都市，與蔚為壯觀的自然景觀構成了南京獨特的園林城市風貌。
strTitle: 【穿越南京回到歷史】南京博物院＋頤和路民國建築群＋南京大學 包車一日遊（含導遊）

strIntroduction: 西安即古代長安，大小皇陵數十座，其中最具代表性的就是武則天的乾陵、漢景帝的陽陵。保存完整，被破壞的次數少，參觀時能帶你神遊漢唐鼎盛時期的輝煌、體會朝代的更迭。此為西安經典西線行程，不走一趟就太可惜了！
strTitle: 【西安帝陵經典】乾陵(武則天墓)＋漢陽陵(漢景帝墓)＋法門寺一日遊

strIntroduction: 想要盡收西湖全景？還是要觀看夜晚漂亮閃爍似壯大顆寶石的夜景呢？在寶石山兩個杭州最令人印象深刻的行程都能夠體驗得到，在這裡亦沒有大波遊人的熙熙攘攘，讓喜愛寧靜接觸大自然的您更能享受杭州西湖的美，更不能錯過的，是傍晚夕陽入夜時“落日餘暉寶石山”的美，就讓我們一窺究竟吧
strTitle: 【帶不走的巨大寶石】杭州寶石山 包車一日遊

strIntroduction: 龙门古镇位于富春江南岸， 东汉名士严子陵游览龙门山时称赞“此地山清水秀，胜似吕梁龙门”，龙门因此得名。古镇是三国东吴大帝孙权后裔最大的聚居地，全镇现居7000多人，有90%以上为孙姓。这里是现今江南地区明清风格古建筑群中保存极为完整且极为罕见的山乡古镇
strTitle: 【山清水秀胜似吕梁龙门】杭州富阳龙门古镇门票

strIntroduction: 濃郁的少數民族風情、山川秀美、景色迷人，這裡有著悠久的歷史，數量龐大的古蹟，依山傍水、風景秀麗的村寨、熱情的民族，飽經滄桑卻依然靜默屹立的古城，清秀的山，靈動的水，這裡的一切都是那麼的令人沉醉，跟著KKDay安排的專業導遊暢遊貴州，也覽盡並記錄下這裡最美的光影！
strTitle: 【攝影控不可錯過】Ａ線：貴州黔西南＋黔東南大環線 14天探索秘境（含住＋私家專業導遊）

strIntroduction: 对首次来京的朋友来说，从中轴线开始是最快了解北京的途径，850年历史北京的中轴线，汇集了古代建筑的精髓，体现了地道的北京人生活方式，见证了发展变迁。悠闲的骑着自行车，感受中国最华丽的建筑路线，前往中轴线中心-景山，俯视古老的城市，被规模宏大的东方建筑群落透露出的王气征服 ！
strTitle: 【北京夜骑】中轴线自行车半日游

strIntroduction: 太湖，山水交融、構圖秀雅、千姿百態的天然山水畫面，有著重巒疊嶂、山勢嵯峨、形態各異的奇峰怪石，盛開千百年的古樹名柯和繁花似錦、碩果滿山的傳統植物景觀，觀賞撲朔迷離、變幻莫測的霧幔、雲海、串月、旭日、晚霞和四季更迭的天象景觀，小橋流水、綠樹人家、稻香桑茂、碧波繁花的江南田園風光。
strTitle: 【湖光山色、吳越史跡】蘇州太湖東、西山 包車一日遊

strIntroduction: Lhasa maintain their own mysterious charm, quickly absorbed the colorful cultures around the world, regardless of what place to come, and this deep exotic will hit you right away, such as in a dream, for this piece of pure land plateau, and there was cause for a long time can not forget the blue sky, and anyone can not resist.
strTitle: 【Lhasa, Tibet】8-day Lhasa Tour（Including Accommodation）B1

strIntroduction: 濃郁的少數民族風情、山川秀美、景色迷人，這裡有著悠久的歷史，數量龐大的古蹟，依山傍水、風景秀麗的村寨、熱情的民族，飽經滄桑卻依然靜默屹立的古城，清秀的山，靈動的水，這裡的一切都是那麼的令人沉醉，跟著KKDay安排的專業導遊暢遊貴州，也覽盡並記錄下這裡最美的光影！
strTitle: 【深入原始苗鄉侗寨】7天貴州黔東南線 走入村寨民族文化（含住＋私家專業導遊）

strIntroduction: 听过沙漠唱歌吗？被风吹起的沙砾拍打在你的身上，哒哒的声响仿佛历经千年的敦煌在对你讲述古往今来丝绸之路的故事，走过莫高窟，上千年的历史徐徐展露在眼前，见证古代辉煌的文化和绘画技巧，人们对佛国世界的向往和尊崇。骑着骆驼走鸣沙山，在山顶上看沙海和日落，感受西北大漠的苍凉广阔！
strTitle: 【敦煌千年之恋】鸣沙山、月牙泉、莫高窟 东线一日游

strIntroduction: 大型舞台动作剧《功夫传奇》融和中华武术、杂技、舞蹈等多种艺术元素，是中国唯一既在国内红剧场、同时又在美国白宫剧院常演的商演剧目，爱尔兰副大使曾赞叹：“这是一出比《大河之舞》更振奋人心的表演”！如果你从没看过功夫秀，这是一个大好机会，因为《功夫传奇》绝对不会让你失望！
strTitle: 【国际知名功夫秀】夜游北京:功夫传奇

strTitle: Halong Bay 2D1N Private Trip (4 Star Hotel)

strIntroduction: Ho Chi Minh city, aka. Saigon is the biggest city in Vietnam and also the former capital of the Southern Vietnam during the Vietnamese war. Saigon is enriched by the Chinese, French and traditional Vietnamese cultures and life styles. Let's explore the highlights of Vietnamese life and Ho Chi Minh!
strTitle: Ho Chi Minh City 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: One of the most popular modes of transport for visitors to Vietnam!
strLocation: Vietnam, Nha Trang, Da Lat, Mũi Né, Ho Chi Minh
strTitle: Open Bus : Depart from Saigon

strIntroduction: Choose to stay on the 3 start or 4 start cruise to enjoy a peaceful and joyful journey through the UNESCO heritage- Ha Long Bay. Enjoy the facilities on the boat and experience natural life down the boat; you are going to create an unforgettable memory during the tour!
strTitle: 2D1N: Hanoi to Halong on Cruise

strIntroduction: One of those MUST-SEE when you visit Ho Chi Minh City !
strTitle: Cu Chi Tunnels Half Day

strIntroduction: Start your day with a 2-hour guided for sightseeing Saigon to discover the best places of the city!
strTitle: Good Morning Saigon with River Cruise Breakfast

strIntroduction: Every year, Hue attracts a lot of tourist coming all over the world. The most famous tour they often choose to discover Hue is Hue city tour which shows tourists not only special historical sites but also beautiful landscapes of the ancient city.
strTitle: Explore the History of Hue

strIntroduction: This tour will take you to many places for discovery street food, local culture. You will visit district 3, 10 and 5 on this journey and visit Saigon’s flower market and Cao Dai temple as well. It’s really exciting! Book it now and be closer to Sai Gon!
strTitle: Saigon Street Food Trip with Master Chef

strIntroduction: My Tho is 86 km away from Ho Chi Minh City and one of the attractive destinations not to be missed. The major economy of My Tho is from agriculture. Coconut trees occupy most of its land, thus it dominates the My Tho’s scenery. There will be activities such as taking a boat ride on Tien River, overlooking the floating houses along the river, sitting on a horse-cart and taking part in learning how to make the coconut candies as well as participating in rowing a small boat in a canal…
strTitle: My Tho and Ben Tre Full Day Join-in Trip

strIntroduction: Coach trip to Ninh Binh, 100km down the South of Hai Noi to see Hoa Lu citadel, the first capital of Vietnam in the 10th century with visiting 2 temples of the Dinh King and the Le King.
strTitle: Hoa Lu to Tam Coc 1 Day Trip (Ninh Binh )

strIntroduction: Hoi An is a must-to-go destination when visiting the Central of Vietnam. Its unique beauty attracts thousands travelers every year. This tour brings you a chance to discover Hoi An Ancient Town in your own way. Don’t forget to visit Japanese Bridge, Old Houses Complex and other highlights before we meet each other for lunch. Beside that the Hoi An Cuisine is also one of the best favor in Vietnam so take this chance to taste some local food such as White Rose Cake, Cao Lau (Instant wheat noodle). If you are a shopaholic don’t miss to have a look at silk shop for tailor make your clothes with amazing quickly in couple hours.
strTitle: Visit Hoi An In Your Own Way - Private Tour

strIntroduction: Content yourself with an atmospheric scene of mountains wreathed in mist !
strTitle: Ba Na Hill - The Road To Heavenly Scenery

strIntroduction: Ninh Binh is a hidden gem of Vietnam. The natural tourist attractions like rain forest, limestone peaks are waiting for you to explore!
strTitle: Limestone Gem- Ninh Binh 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: KKday provides you the most convenient and thoughtful transfer service from Tan Son Nhat International Airport to Ho Chi Minh City.
strTitle: [Private Transfer] Tan Son Nhat Airport－Ho Chi Minh City

strIntroduction: One of the most popular modes of transport for visitors to Vietnam!
strTitle: Open Bus: Depart from Ha Noi

strIntroduction: Trang An Eco-Tourism Complex is a complex beauty - landscapes called as an 'outdoor geological museum' with numerous caves, mountains, valley water, trees and the historic relic. Bai Dinh pagoda is the largest pagoda in this complex that known as many records such as: the largest pagoda of Vietnam, the biggest gold - plated copper of Asia and the longest lobby in Asia. Join with us to discover the beauty of this majestic landscape.
strTitle: Discover Majestic Trang An Complex

strIntroduction: Enjoy a fast and scenic speedboat trip to the Mekong Delta departing by boat from our pier in Ho Chi Minh City.
strTitle: Mekong Delta Speedboat Tour

strIntroduction: Phong Nha – Ke Bang area has a group of over 300 caves multi – shaped known as the “Kingdom of the cave”, where there is a mystery of wonders and attraction, a paradise for scientists in caves, explorers and tourists.
strTitle: Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park 1 Day

strIntroduction: KKday is proudly introduced you the fastest airport transfers which can get you from the airport to your accommodation as quick as possible.
strTitle: Da Nang - Da Nang Intl. Airport Transfers

strIntroduction: An amazing trip will take you to all the famous places in Danang in one day. The tour will be start from the morning and finish at the same day evening at Hue city.
strLocation: Vietnam, Hue, Da Nang, Hoi An
strTitle: Danang and Hoi An 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Hanoi’s Old Quarter is famous by its old architecture and culinary. There are not only big luxury restaurants but also small shops and stalls even in corners with various kinds of food. By Hanoi street food tour, we bring you to visit Old Quarter and to try local food and drinks. Many of them are only well-known by local people such as mixed fruits, egg coffee, etc. It’s also an opportunity to learn more about Hanoi culture through culinary. Let’s join with us.
strTitle: Hanoi Street Food

strIntroduction: With this tour, you will have a chance to visit 2 most beautiful islands and enjoy wonderful atmosphere on boat and watch sunset. You also will join in catching fishing and squid with local fishermen and taste dishes from your achievement. How interesting the tour is!
strTitle: Phu Quoc Snorkeling and Fishing 1 Day Excursion

strIntroduction: The tour brings you to areas in Hue rarely seen by visitor, in a fun and unique way on a nice scooter with Vietnamese ladies in traditional Ao Dai as tour guides. This tour is a personal experience and our colorfully dressed ladies will do their best to insure it includes the things you want to see, after all, it is your vacation and what you want is paramount.
strTitle: Discovering The Beauty Of Hue With Ao Dai

strIntroduction: Pre-1975, the city was where the heroic resistance against aggressors and the struggling process for independence took place. But today, the city is bustling with people and it is the major financial hub of the country as well as the biggest city of Viet Nam. Cu Chi tunnels are one of the most famous historical vestiges of Viet Nam’s national liberation war. The network consists of over 200km of tunnels connected with one another like a cobweb.
strTitle: Cu Chi Tunnel and Saigon City Join-in Tour

strIntroduction: One day sunrise tour to Hoi An fish village. Help the fisherman to catch the fish, learn to paddle a unique Vietnamese bamboo basket boat, and enjoy the complimentary breakfast prepared by our chef Captain Cook!
strTitle: Fish Market At The Sunrise Tour

strIntroduction: Best Eco-Adventure speedboat tour to the Can Gio Mangrove Forest (UNESCO Biosphere Reserve).
strTitle: Discover Can Gio Forest Tour

strIntroduction: Our tour will take you to the great nature beauty of Phu Quoc Island. You will have an opportunity to visit 2 most beautiful islands – Finger Island and Turtle Island. Enjoy lunch and relaxed atmosphere with us. Book it now!
strTitle: North Phu Quoc Snorkeling and Fishing Fun

strIntroduction: Come to Perfume Pagoda, you may feel like your spirituality lives in harmony with nature. ... Visit the Buddhist shrine built inside grottoes and ride on a boat to see the Vietnamese style of river view. Book the tour online and be ready to enjoy the most beauty of Vietnam.
strTitle: Perfume Pagoda 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: 胡志明很美、很繁華，但走訪都市之餘，也不能錯過越南的鄉村風光。跟著KKday來一趟南越水上市場之旅，走訪胡志明近郊最有名的兩大水上市場，體驗當地人的生活方式，絕對是你永生難忘的體驗！
strTitle: Floating Markets 2 Days Adventure

strIntroduction: Do you want to try to row a basket boat on a river? Would you like to go for a ride on a water buffalo? Yes? Well, let's go and experience Vietnam's traditional fishing culture!!
strTitle: Basket Boat & Buffalo Ride Adventure

strIntroduction: Dalat, also Da Lat (Đà Lạt), located in the South Central Highlands of Vietnam, was originally the playground of the French who built villas in the clear mountain air to escape the heat and humidity of the coast.
strTitle: Da Lat City 1 Day Join-in Tour

strIntroduction: Transfer from Hanoi to Ninh Binh or another direction. KKday provides you the most convenient and thoughtful transfer service.
strTitle: Private Transfer from Hanoi to Ninh Binh

strIntroduction: 大叻是建在海拔一千五百多米的高原上的座小城，周圍是一望無垠的松林。大叻自然風光雄美壯觀，氣候清新宜人。年均溫度在攝氏十七度上下，是越南少有的高原度假勝地，被譽為「越南私藏的法國」
strTitle: 大叻市區一日遊租車

strIntroduction: 富國島因為沒有被過度開發，保有清澈的海水和潔白的沙灘，且該島盛產珍珠，故又被稱為「珍珠島」。
strTitle: Phu Quoc Island day tour (South Island)

strIntroduction: 河內最具代表性的特色36古街，用最傳統的人力車漫遊方式帶你細細玩味越南風情！
strTitle: 【Hanoi】Rickshaw at the 36 streets

strIntroduction: No way! There is an island resort in Vietnam and people can enjoy to play all the equipment on the island? Yes, you heard right! No matter you go shopping or swimming, Vinpearl Land will always give your more than you thought!
strTitle: 2D1N: Nha Trang – Vinpearl Land (Stay at 3 star hotel)

strTitle: 3D2N Phu Quoc Island＋Vinpearl Land (Stay in 4-star Hotel)

strIntroduction: This tour provides an opportunity to discover Dark cave, which was discovered in 1990 with length of 5,258m, by zip-line and enjoy the natural landscapes nearby. You will get exciting experience when swimming across Thuy Tien Lake in cool waters of around 20°C. on the way to Dark Cave, we also stop to introduce you about DMZ of Vietnam, including La Vang Church, Quang Tri Old Citadel, Hien Luong Bridge, Ben Hai River, etc.
strTitle: Dark Cave Adventure

strIntroduction: Ho Chi Minh City is also known as Saigon. It was once considered as the Pearl of the Far East and now it is the modern metropolis with more than 8 billion inhabitants. Today the city is the economic center of Vietnam but not too long ago; this is where the heroic resistance against aggressors and the struggling process for independence took place.
strTitle: Ho Chi Minh City 1 Day Join-in Tour

strIntroduction: My Tho is located in the Mekong Delta, which is the rice basket of Vietnam. KKday invites you to experience authentique southern Vietnam!
strTitle: Saigon and My Tho 1 Day Private Trip

strIntroduction: Da Nang Seafood Adventure is a true culinary trip along the beautiful west coast of Vietnam, allowing you to sample mouth-watering fresh seafood. You will explore some of the most spectacular coastal scenery Vietnam has to offer. Da Nang Seafood adventure focuses on fresh seafood and locals’ night life. You will not get it if you were just a tourist walking around by yourself. Our enthusiastic tour guides will show you best place to eat fresh seafood with Da Nang styles of eating as well as offer much insights to local life.
strLocation: Vietnam, Ha Long Bay, Da Nang
strTitle: Da Nang Seafood Adventure

strIntroduction: Join us to a home cooking class and learn the true authentic Vietnamese cuisine.

strIntroduction: Riding to find the charm of Hue was synthesized and designed based on Hue classic tours, but in a different way – traveling by a motorbike. Our tour focus on highlight spots, most famous and beautiful places in Hue. Our criterion is bringing to travelers the real view of Hue ancient Capital, don’t have a lot of places in a tour program to avoid duplication that will make customers be bored and waste of time.
strTitle: Riding To Find The Charm Of Hue

strIntroduction: With hundreds of boats filled with vegetables, fruits and many other products are anchored along the river. strIntroduction: Hoi An Ancient Town is so sparkling in everynight thanks to lanterns hanging out some shops on the streets. How do the craftsmen make them?
